items.name: Antalpha
items.description: Antalpha (NASDAQ: ANTA) is a leading fintech company specializing in providing financing, technology and risk management solutions to institutions in the digital asset industry. Antalpha offers Bitcoin supply chain and pledge loans through the Antalpha Prime technology platform, which allows customers to originate and manage their digital assets loans, as well as monitor collateral positions with near real-time data.

items.name: Treasury
items.description: Treasury is Europe’s pioneering euro-denominated Bitcoin treasury company, bridging traditional finance with the future of digital capital. With Bitcoin as the catalyst and benchmark of digital gold, we provide a transparent, liquid, and institutional-grade vehicle for Bitcoin structure.

items.name: Crypto.com
items.description: Founded in 2016, Crypto.com is trusted by more than 150 million users worldwide and is the industry leader in regulatory compliance, security and privacy. Our vision is simple: Cryptocurrency in Every Wallet™. Crypto.com is committed to accelerating the adoption of cryptocurrency through innovation.Crypto.com is now building the most comprehensive financial technology destination - with products and services ranging from crypto, to equities, to cards and more. It has created one of the first digital commerce ecosystems, integrating payments, trading, and financial services.Today, Crypto.com stands as the world's leading cryptocurrency platform for licenses, registrations, and security certifications, and is the most recognized brand in crypto, with thrilling, never-been-done before partnerships and activations.Learn more at https://crypto.com.

items.name: Exodus
items.description: Exodus empowers individuals to take control of their lives in a digital world with secure, user-friendly crypto software. Since 2015, Exodus has made digital assets accessible through self-custodial wallets that put users in full control of their funds, enabling seamless swaps, buys, and sells. For businesses, Exodus offers Passkeys Wallet and XO Swap, leading solutions for embedded crypto wallets and swap aggregation. Committed to accessible and secure finance, Exodus is shaping the future of digital ownership.

items.name: BITMAIN
items.description: Established in 2013, BITMAIN is the world's leading manufacturer of cryptocurrency mining servers.The company's ANTMINER product has long maintained a leading position within the industry in terms of technical strength and market status. With cutting-edge technology in energy efficiency, the company offers advanced computational infrastructure and solutions to the global blockchain network.

items.name: Metaplanet
items.description: Metaplanet Inc. (TSE Standard 3350) is a publicly traded Bitcoin Treasury Company listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange, pioneering the adoption of Bitcoin as a corporate treasury reserve asset in Japan. Metaplanet aims to enhance shareholder value through ongoing Bitcoin accumulation.

items.name: Mining Grid
items.description: Mining Grid is dedicated to providing solutions designed to simplify and scale mining efforts for the Bitcoin enthusiast. Our flagship platform, Mining Race is a user-friendly mobile application that offers an innovative, community-driven approach to BTC mining. Focused on speed and simplicity, Mining Race aims to bring Bitcoin mining to users worldwide, helping them achieve high-performance results seamlessly.​Youtube

items.name: Nakamoto
items.description: Nakamoto is a Bitcoin treasury and financial services company that aims to catalyze global Bitcoin adoption through capital markets. Nakamoto is designed to advance and sustain the long-term securitization of Bitcoin and its role as a global reserve asset.

items.name: The Blockchain Center Abu Dhabi
items.description: The Blockchain Center in Abu Dhabi is the leading hub for innovation, education, and collaboration. It drives blockchain adoption through strategic partnerships, venture funding, and cutting-edge research. The Blockchain Center supports startups, enterprises, and regulators in building a global Web3 ecosystem, solidifying it’s global position as a leader in blockchain and emerging technologies.​‍

items.name: Calamos
items.description: Our history traces back to the challenging markets of the 1970s, when John P. Calamos, Sr. began his investment career using convertible securities to help clients build wealth and manage risk. The hallmarks of those early days—innovation, risk management and client focus—continue to define our organization today. Our investment solutions include alternative, equity, sustainable, multi-asset, fixed income and convertible strategies.We view our success and longevity as a reflection of our ability to meet the demands of investors through long-term performance, organic growth and strategic acquisition. Through that lens, we are honored that our assets under management have nearly doubled under the leadership of our President and Chief Executive Officer John Koudounis. Under his leadership, we have also expanded our presence in New York and Chicago, grown our wealth management capabilities, and established ourselves as a leading liquid alternatives provider, the third largest in the United States.Headquartered in Naperville, Illinois, Calamos Investments has offices in Chicago, New York, San Francisco, Milwaukee, Portland, and the Miami area.‍

items.name: Bitkey
items.description: Bitkey is the bitcoin self-custody wallet from Block, Inc. Its built-in multi-signature security and recovery system replaces the need for seed phrases — giving you full control of your bitcoin without the risks of relying on a single backup. Bitkey was created to make self-custody accessible and empower more people around the world to truly own their money. Learn more at bitkey.world.

items.name: CoinW
items.description: CoinW stands as a pinnacle in the world of crypto trading platforms, where our unwavering commitment to security, transparency, and user-centric principles sets us apart. Powered by cutting-edge technology, boasting deep liquidity, and offering support for a diverse array of cryptocurrencies, we have cultivated a vast and dedicated user base, solidifying our position as one of the most secure exchanges globally.

items.name: SALT Lending
items.description: SALT Lending, changing the way you HODL since 2016, provides treasury management and liquidity services without requiring the sale of your bitcoin. Our crypto-backed services enable major purchases, boost your spending power, and expand business opportunities.SALT’s secure, user-friendly platform makes cryptocurrency practical for everyday use. BORROW to access liquidity. LEND to earn yield. SALT allows you to power your infinite potential by rethinking how you HODL.

items.name: Core
items.description: Core is Bitcoin’s first Proof of Stake (PoS) layer and the largest Bitcoin DeFi ecosystem, merging the unparalleled security of Bitcoin with the scalability of the Satoshi Plus consensus. Core’s Dual Staking empowers Bitcoin holders to earn secure and sustainable yields by staking both BTC and CORE, all while retaining full control of their assets. Over 5,000 BTC and 165M CORE have been staked on the Core blockchain, enhancing Bitcoin’s utility and security. Core is the most Bitcoin-aligned EVM blockchain with ~76% of Bitcoin mining hash power contributing to the network’s security. This breakthrough has amassed millions of Core adopters — over 39M unique addresses, 353M+ transactions, and over $800M TVL since its mainnet launch in January 2023.

items.name: Crypto Miners
items.description: CryptoMiners specializes in miners hosting, hydro mining solutions and containers local manufacturing, colocation facilities and data centre setups for government and B2B partners, repair & maintenance services and blockchain projects. Having recognition on B2G levels and 8 physical stores and office across the globe, Visioning our future plans of eco-friendly solutions and energy efficiency through our worldwide R&D teams, we are expanding our services including sustainable PPE projects, data storage entity and one stop solution for all your crypto investment needs with trust and reliabilityInstagramTikTok

items.name: Uminers
items.description: Uminers is a global provider of Bitcoin mining solutions, serving over 7,000 clients with high-performance ASIC hardware, hosting, and logistics. The company delivers more than 5,000 miners monthly and operates a large-scale, hydro-powered data center in Ethiopia. Its new 175 MW facility will support both blockchain and AI workloads, aligning with Uminers’ strategy to future-proof its infrastructure. Headquartered in Hong Kong with 14+ years of experience, Uminers delivers trusted, turnkey services to the Bitcoin mining community.

items.name: EToro
items.description: For more than a decade, eToro has been a leader in the global Fintech revolution. It is the world’s leading social trading network, with millions of registered users and an array of innovative trading and investment tools.

items.name: Bitcoin Art Society
items.description: Bitcoin Art Society is a curator-led initiative dedicated to elevating Bitcoin‑native art and culture. We bring together artists, collectors, and institutions to create, exhibit, and preserve work whose provenance and story live on Bitcoin.Our mission is to highlight meaningful art, support creators, and make collecting on Bitcoin accessible and rewarding for a global audience. We believe in long‑term cultural value: careful curation, respectful presentation, and archival permanence.Instagram Link

items.name: MZUN GLOBAL
items.description: Mzun Global is a diversified international investment and technology firm with a strategic focus on the digital asset ecosystem and advanced computing infrastructure. We provide integrated solutions across digital asset investment, high-performance computing platforms, and large-scale digital infrastructure operations. Supported by deep financial expertise, energy-efficient engineering, and scalable compute architecture, Mazoon Global empowers partners to participate in the future of digital finance with clarity and confidence. Our mission is to build transparent, reliable, and technologically advanced platforms that unlock long-term value in an increasingly digital global economy.

items.name: BiXBiT
items.description: BiXBiT company designs and manufactures immersion cooling systems for ASIC, GPU, FPGA, server hardware, and develops software solutions to maximize the efficiency and performance of mining devices.

items.name: ERA Wallet
items.description: ERA Wallet is a Dubai-based startup that develops, manufactures, and sells a next-generation hardware crypto wallet. ERA is a fully air-gapped device designed for maximum security and ease of use. It gives users full control through transparent verification and offline signing. The device combines a durable IP67-rated body, advanced key-protection mechanisms, and a paperless NFC backup system, making self-custody intuitive and reliable.

items.name: ALPS
items.description: Alps is a global infrastructure company that designs, builds, and operates next-generation data centers for Bitcoin mining and high-performance computing, combining technological excellence with energy innovation.

items.name: Herald Exchange
items.description: HeraldEX is an all-in-one crypto platform that lets users trade with ease, access essential services like OTC, on-ramp and off-ramp, and send money globally through, stable-coin remittance.

items.name: Coin Vigilante
items.description: Founded in 2021, the Coin Vigilante brand originated from the idea of creating high quality watches inspired by Bitcoin. Designed in the US, worn in over 30 countries - our goal is to craft unique timepieces that signify the importance of sound money for those who wear them - a movement that shows the world what we stand for. Our journey became a reality after launching a successful Kickstarter campaign where we raised 6 figures from backers across the world who believe in the movement.

items.name: Bitcoin.com
items.description: The World’s Gateway to Bitcoin and BeyondSince 2015, Bitcoin.com has been a global leader in introducing newcomers to Bitcoin, cryptocurrency, and decentralized finance. Our mission is to lead in self-custody cryptocurrency products and services while offering trusted media that educates and empowers. We provide secure, user-friendly tools and insightful content to drive financial independence and shape the future of decentralized finance.

items.name: Prenetics/IM8
items.description: Prenetics (NASDAQ: PRE) is the world's first sustainable Bitcoin treasury company, uniquely positioned with a dual-engine growth strategy that combines profitable healthcare operations with systematic Bitcoin accumulation through both organic cash flows and strategic external funding. Prenetics operates IM8, the world's fastest-growing supplements brand co-founded by David Beckham, which will generate $100M+ ARR in its first 12 months from launch, providing strong cash flows to fund daily Bitcoin purchases. This positions Prenetics to build one of the largest corporate Bitcoin treasury strategies while maintaining operational profitability and providing both asset value protection and unlimited Bitcoin upside potential.​

items.name: Rain
items.description: Rain is a cryptocurrency brokerage and custodian servicing the Middle East, Turkey, and North Africa.​‍

items.name: KeychainX
items.description: KeychainX recovers lost Bitcoin passwords and private keys from encrypted files, damaged hard drives or phones. Our recovery service has been helping recover Bitcoin since 2017 and is success based, no recovery - no fee. We support Electrum, Multibit, Bitcoin Core, Trezor devices, blockchain.com and many more software and hardware wallets.

items.name: OCEAN
items.description: OCEAN is a transformative mining pool that brings decentralization and transparency back to mining. Miners get rewarded directly from the blockchain and can verify that they're getting what they should be getting. Furthermore, with the DATUM protocol, miners on OCEAN can design their own block templates having full control over the contents of their blocks. ​‍

items.name: ChainUp
items.description: ​ChainUp, a leading global provider of digital asset solutions, empowers businesses to navigate the complexities of this evolving ecosystem. ​Serving a diverse clientele from Web3 companies to established financial institutions, ChainUp's comprehensive suite of solutions includes crypto exchange solutions, liquidity technology, white label MPC wallet, KYT crypto tracing analytics tool, asset tokenization, crypto asset management, and Web3 infrastructure such as mining, staking, and blockchain APIs. For more information, visit: https://www.chainup.com/ ​

items.name: MOONWALK SYSTEMS
items.description: MOONWALK SYSTEMS was founded as a stepping stone for driving innovation in the blockchain industry within the region. Our ambitious plan to propel the advancement of the blockchain technology and data centers development started in 2020 at the heart of the region's crypto hub - Dubai. Since then, we have expanded our presence globally with strategically located offices worldwide.Our ground-breaking approach to providing turnkey blockchain solutions makes us the go-to destination for entrepreneurs and businesses. In addition, our hosting facilities offer comprehensive solutions for blockchain related-hardware owners, with cutting-edge cooling and security systems, so you can rest assured that you are getting the most out of your investment!

items.name: The Saif House
items.description: The Saif House is an independent Bitcoin-only publisher dedicated to advancing sound economic thinking. We publish The Bitcoin Standard, The Fiat Standard, The Gold Standard, and Principles of Economics by Saifedean Ammous, along with works by other authors exploring Bitcoin and Austrian economics. Through books, courses, and seminars, The Saif House promotes education rooted in hard money, individual sovereignty, and long-term thinking.

items.name: Bitkern Group
items.description: Bitkern has been serving Bitcoin miners since 2017, providing Swiss-quality hosting with 85,000+ ASICs online across 18+ global locations. We bring miners online within 24 hours — fast, reliable, and optimized for maximum performance.​‍

items.name: Bitfunded
items.description: Bitfunded is the easiest place to get a funded account in crypto. Prove your skills in a simulated challenge and trade with up to 150K USDT.​​

items.name: Starknet
items.description: Starknet is building Bitcoin’s execution layer. Powered by STARK proofs, Starknet lets Bitcoin users put their sats to work with unmatched scaling, UX, and liquidity - without compromising on decentralization or security. Co-founded by Professor Eli Ben-Sasson, co-founder and former Chief Scientist of Zcash, Starknet brings world-class cryptographic innovation to Bitcoin.

items.name: OVEX
items.description: OVEX is an African-focused crypto exchange enabling cryptocurrency as the default settlement layer for faster, more secure cross-border payments. We provide deep liquidity and robust local rails for high-volume and institutional-grade clients.‍

items.name: N.exchange
items.description: Integrate crypto trading into your platform with our high-performance, compliant API. Launch in days with enterprise-grade speed, security, and reliability.‍

items.name: BitFuFu
items.description: BitFuFu Inc. (Nasdaq: FUFU) is a world-leading Bitcoin miner and mining services innovator. BitFuFu is committed to empowering the global Bitcoin network through its industry-leading cloud mining platform, rapidly scaling infrastructure, and innovative mining services.​‍

items.name: Laser Digital
items.description: Laser Digital is a full-spectrum digital finance company, powering institutional participation in the on-chain economy. As a regulated and trusted counterparty, we enable institutions, miners, treasuries, and whales holding the world’s most popular cryptocurrency – Bitcoin, to capitalise on existing and emerging opportunities. Our services include yield-bearing BTC asset management fund, tailored OTC spot & derivatives trading and structured treasury management. BTC holders benefit from our global connectivity across key markets, as well as our network of trusted counterparties from staking to custody, and team of highly experienced professionals (ex-Barclays, Nomura, Brevan Howard, B2C2, Bluecrest, GSR).

items.name: VolcMiner
items.description: VOLCMINER is committed to becoming a global leader in chip innovation. By providing cutting-edge technology and a comprehensive ecosystem, we continuously push the boundaries of high-performance miners which could customizable air cooling, water cooling, oil cooling, machine size,machine appearance etc.

items.name: MillionMiner
items.description: MillionMiner is the leading provider of professional mining hardware in Europe. With strong partnerships with industry leaders such as NiceHash, VoskCoin, EMCD and many more, MillionMiner not only offers first-class ASIC miners, but also exclusive access to events, mining pools and hosting services worldwide. Whether you are new to mining or a professional, we combine state-of-the-art technology with reliable support, fair prices and an international network for sustainable mining success.

items.name: Fooksum
items.description: Fooksum is a global logistics provider specializing in the transportation and warehousing of cryptocurrency mining and high-performance computing equipment. With over 5 years of experience and more than 200,000 servers shipped worldwide, Fooksum offers reliable air, sea, and land freight solutions, along with secure storage in key markets including the U.S., Canada, Dubai, and Southeast Asia.

items.name: Komainu
items.description: Komainu is the institutional gateway for digital assets, headquartered in Jersey, with offices in London, Dubai, and Singapore. Offering bank-grade infrastructure for institutional investors, Komainu provides seamless, connected and secure services with multi-jurisdictional regulatory oversight, merging expertise from traditional financial services with leading security standards for the next generation of institutional digital asset custody, servicing & financing solutions.

items.name: Bitlayer
items.description: Bitlayer is pioneering the first BitVM implementation. By merging unparalleled security with a lightning-fast smart contract engine, Bitlayer unlocks the full potential of Bitcoin DeFi.Built on Bitcoin’s native security architecture, Bitlayer is constructing a trust-minimized BitVM Bridge, a yield-bearing asset YBTC and a high-throughput Bitcoin Rollup — bringing true utility, speed, and composability to Bitcoin, and establishing a complete DeFi infrastructure for the Bitcoin ecosystem.

items.name: Amana
items.description: amana is a leading MENA neo-broker, established in 2010 and headquartered in Dubai. Serving a thriving community of over 350,000 users, amana empowers traders and investors with an all-in-one, commission-free trading app that provides access to 6,800+ global and regional assets — including 375+ crypto coins, stocks, forex, indices, commodities, ETFs, metals, and more. With a relentless focus on transparency, education, and inclusivity, amana is redefining access to financial markets in the region.

items.name: GOAT Network
items.description: Bitcoin Native ZK Rollup with Sustainable BTC Yield

items.name: CitizenX
items.description: CitizenX is the world's first citizenship market. We help high-net-worth individuals and their families diversify their passport portfolio in Bitcoin-friendly jurisdictions, ensuring a safe future for you and your loved ones.‍‍

items.name: Bitwadi
items.description: Bitwadi is the Middle East’s first Bitcoin-only platform, built to make buying, saving, and investing in Bitcoin simple, secure, and fully local. Founded in Saudi Arabia, Bitwadi bridges the gap between traditional finance and Bitcoin with transparent pricing, compliant infrastructure, and Arabic-first support. Our mission is to give individuals across the region a trusted and sovereign way to participate in the Bitcoin economy. Bitwadi is proudly independent, Bitcoin-only, and built for the long term.

items.name: Compass Mining
items.description: Compass is the world's first bitcoin mining marketplace which provides everyone the opportunity to mine bitcoin profitably. Our mission is to strengthen Bitcoin's network by democratizing hashrate and providing institutions and retail the ability and access to own bitcoin mining hardware and host it at the best facilities around the world.

items.name: KAST
items.description: KAST is an app to save, send, and spend stablecoins around the world. With its virtual and physical cards, you can spend money and earn points on every purchase. Bitcoin Card coming soon.​‍

items.name: Munich International Mining LLC
items.description: GREEN and EASY Bitcoin Mining. We make Mining accessible for everyone.

items.name: GDA
items.description: GDA is one of the world’s largest and most experienced industrial-scale bitcoin mining companies, with a track record of building, managing, and scaling data centre operations spanning nearly a decade.We champion innovation, responsible energy use, and investment in the communities where we operate globally, including the 20 data centres across North America, South America, Europe, and Central Asia.With a total power capacity of over 600 MW, the company has brought over 180,000 miners online.At GDA, we are committed to supporting the infrastructure for the future of money by making the bitcoin network more robust, resilient, and secure.

items.name: XBTO
items.description: Founded in 2015, XBTO is a full-service digital asset platform that offers institutions, family offices and high net worth individuals access to best-in-class investment solutions, enabling them to navigate the digital asset market with confidence. ​The organization is licensed by the Bermuda Monetary Authority under the Digital Asset Business Act and has received an IPA from the FSRA in ADGM. XBTO has a presence in 6 locations: Bermuda, Miami, New York, London, Paris, and Abu Dhabi.

items.name: Tangem
items.description: Tangem is a technology company founded in 2017. The Tangem Wallet — its flagship product — is a hardware wallet for managing thousands of cryptocurrencies and other digital assets on over 60 blockchain networks, focusing on simplicity and utmost security. Tangem cold wallet built for you. Wear it, use it, hide it.

items.name: Nexa by Bitcoin Unlimited
items.description: Bitcoin Unlimited (BU) is a blockchain development team, formed in 2015, driving onchain scalability solutions for the Bitcoin network. In 2017, the BU full node software achieved over 50% of hashpower. At that time, scaling layer-1 was not achieved, but nearly 10 years of optimization and parallelization of the original Satoshi UTXO architecture IS achieved.In 2022, BU launched Nexa, which incorporates all the above advancements, including adding native tokens, smart contracts and hardware acceleration for full nodes.BU's current important goal is enabling a wrapped BTC on the Nexa blockchain, transferable on and off the Bitcoin network.

items.name: The Bitcoin Way
items.description: The Bitcoin Way empowers individuals and institutions to achieve true financial sovereignty. We guide clients through every step of the Bitcoin journey, from secure self-custody to running their own node, with a focus on education, security, and long-term sustainability.

items.name: Minotaur Trading Systems
items.description: Minotaur Trading Systems harnesses advanced trading automation technology to give traders an edge, allowing for rapid and precise market engagements. Crafted by top quant traders, our algorithms execute strategies that outperform human capabilities, delivering superior outcomes. Minotaur Trading Systems provides quantitive designed algorithmic trading strategies & smart bot engineering.

items.name: MEXC
items.description: Your Easiest Way to Crypto!

items.name: HashHouse
items.description: HashHouse is a leading provider of innovative solutions in the field of cryptocurrency mining and liquid cooling. With a focus on efficiency and performance, the company offers cutting-edge products and services to empower clients to maximize their mining capabilities. HashHouse is dedicated to pushing boundaries and revolutionizing the industry, empowering clients with turnkey solutions that embody the spirit of progress and excellence in the Bitcoin Mining space.

items.name: Auradine
items.description: Auradine is working on breakthrough scalability, sustainability, and security for the future of internet infrastructure, enabled by revolutionary blockchain, generative AI, and zero-knowledge technologies. We develop complete solutions, including software, silicon systems, and offer our customers both system-level and cloud solutions.

items.name: Listing.Help
items.description: Listing.help is one of the first agencies on the market, providing listing services on crypto exchanges. Since 2017, Listing.Help assisted over 2,000 projects with listings on more than 100 exchanges. Among the clients of the company are Tether EUR, Tether Gold, TON Coin, Shiba, Metal, SYLO, and others.

items.name: LMAX Digital
items.description: LMAX Digital is the institutional crypto currency exchange, operated by LMAX Group.Leveraging LMAX Group proven, robust technology and liquidity relationships, LMAX Digital delivers a market-leading solution for physical trading and custodial services for the most liquid crypto currencies – such as BTC (Bitcoin).Delivering trust, reliability and deep institutional liquidity, LMAX Digital ensures complete transparency, open access and a level playing field for all institutional crypto currency market participants – within a secure trading environment.LMAX Digital is regulated by the Gibraltar Financial Services Commission (GFSC) as a DLT provider for execution and custody services.

items.name: Battery Finance, Inc.
items.description: Battery Finance, an affiliate of Newmarket Capital, is dedicated to the development and management of value-added institutional investment strategies built on and around bitcoin. Battery harnesses the energy of bitcoin and blends it with real-world assets to power novel financing solutions.

items.name: Simple Mining
items.description: Simple Mining is a Vertically Integrated Bitcoin company. We are committed to providing a world class experience in hosting, repairs, and sales for ASIC mining equipment.

items.name: Unistar
items.description: Unistar is a blockchain‑mining‑focused investment company: we invest in digital assets, hold Bitcoin mining machines to execute futures‑strategy investments, and actively seek global power resources to develop and operate mining facilities.Leveraging our factory‑direct procurement model, Unistar guarantees every order from placement through delivery, offering ASIC miners at the lowest mainstream market rates. With a solid presence in the United States, Russia, and the Middle East, we provide large‑scale mining farms, institutional investors, and professional enthusiasts with reliable, high‑performance mining solutions and exceptional value.

items.name: EMCD Top-10 Mining Pool, Coinhold, P2P
items.description: All things crypto in one app:• Buy and sell with 0% fee• Store and earn up to 14% APY• Mine with low 1.5% fee
